段: 詩經有講，「天生眾百姓。」論到這個天e5稱呼，卻m7是青青e5天，就是宇宙大主宰e5上帝。照按呢來看，chiah-e5百姓竟然講叫是天生--e5。In e5身軀雖然是tui3父母出，總是hou7伊有肉體，hou7伊e5活命，實在是tui3上帝e5主宰。M7是本底有--e5，亦m7是家己會有--e5，情理是明明。

Si-keng u7 kong2, “ThiN siN cheng3 peh-siN3.” Lun7 kau3 chit e5 thiN e5 chheng-hou, khiok m7 si7 chhiN-chhiN e5 thiN, chiu7-si7 u2-tiu7 toa7 Chu2-chaiN2 e5 Siong7-te3. Chiau3 an2-ni lai5 khoaN3, chiah-e5 peh-siN3 keng3-jian5 kong2 kio3 si7 thiN-siN--e5. In e5 seng-khu sui-jian5 si7 tui3 pe7-bo2 chhut, chong2-si7 hou7 i u7 bah-the2, hou7 i e5 oah8-mia7, sit8-chai7 si7 tui3 Siong7-te3 e5 chu2-chaiN2. M7 si7 pun2-te2 u7--e5, iah8 m7 si7 ka-ti7 e7 u7--e5, cheng5-li2 si7 beng5-beng5.
所以會看、會聽、會講話、會振動，心leng5-lai7、手敏捷，四肢百體攏合逐項e5路用。推到萬國，傳到萬代，無m7攏是an2-ni，自然應該攏總受伊，來齊全歸--伊，thai2-tho2  thang順趁私慾。

Sou2-i2 e7 khoaN3, e7 thiaN, e7 kong2-oe7, e7 tin2-tang7, sim leng5-lai7, chhiu2 bin2-chiat8, su3-chi pah-the2 long2 hap8 tak8-hang7 e5 lou7-eng7. Chhui kau3 ban7-kok, thoan5 kau3 ban7-tai7, bo5 m7 long2 si7 an2-ni, chu7-jian5 eng-kai long2-chong2 siu7 i, lai5 chiau5-chng5 kui--i; thai2-tho2 thang sun7-than3 su-iok8.
今將腳來論。Kiam2有扑算中國e5查某囡仔，卻有hit個縛腳e5風俗leh。Tui3細漢來包、來纏，到久久chih8-u ，親像斷去，細步勻勻仔跕腳行。講叫短、細是水，就續致到hou7七尺e5身軀，若親像百斤重，行踏艱難，振動be7會自然。

TaN chiong kha lai5 lun7. Kiam2 u7 phah-sng3 Tiong-kok e5 cha-bou2 gin2-na2, khiok u7 hit e5 pak8-kha e5 hong-siok8 leh. Tui3 se3-han3 lai5 pau, lai5 tiN5, kau3 ku2-ku2 chih8-u, chhin-chhiuN7 tng7--khi3, se3-pou7 un5-un5-a2 liam-kha-kiaN5. Kong2 kio3 te2, se3 si7 sui2, chiu7 soa3 ti3-kau3 hou7 chhit chhioh e5 seng-khu, na2 chhin-chhiuN7 pah kin tang7, kiaN5 tah8 kan-lan5, tin2-tang7 be7-e7 chu7-jian5.
HaiN7！真奇怪ah！Boe7 bat有罪，因何受選腳目e5刑罰？總是因為beh學人sui2，才甘願做跛腳e5艱苦行。真正堪tit奇怪。

HaiN7! Chin ki5-koai3 ah! Boe7 bat u7 choe7, in-ho5 siu7 soan2-kha-bak8 e5 heng5-hoat8? Chong2-si7 in-ui7 beh oh8 lang5 sui2, chiah kam-goan7 cho3 pai2-kha e5 kan-khou2 kiaN5. Chin-chiaN3 kham tit ki5-koai3.
我久久看hit個風俗m7忍tiN3 恬，iau2-ku2 boe7設立議論。舊年看閩省會報，有讀美國Bu2-lu2-su2，論縛腳e5冊。從中所指e5毛病，真確實；所講e5情理真有影；真正會堪tit叫醒臭耳人hou7伊聽見，開明青盲人，hou7伊看見，來做雨水流be7-tit去e5石柱，挽回已經敗壞e5歹風俗。可惜！Hit個論iau2-boe7刻印版，be7 tit thang齊pian3流傳。

Goa2 ku2-ku2 khoaN3 hit e5 hong-siok8 m7 jim2 tiN3 tiam7, iau2-ku2 boe7 siat-lip8 gi7-lun7. Ku7-ni5 khoaN3 Ban5-seng2-hoe7-po3, u7 thak8 Bi2-kok Bu2-lu2-su2, lun7 pak8-kha e5 chheh. Chiong5-tiong sou2 chi2 e5 mau5-peng7, chin khak-sit8; sou2 kong2 e5 cheng5-li2 chin u7 iaN2; chin-chiaN3 e7 kham-tit kio3-chhiN2 chhau3-hi7 lang5 hou7 i thiaN-kiN3; khui-beng5 chhiN-mi5 lang5, hou7 i khoaN3-kiN3, lai5 cho3 hou7-chui2 lau5 be7-tit khi3 e5 chioh8-thiau7. Ban2-hoe5 i2-keng pai7-hoai7 e5 phaiN2 hong-siok8. Kho2-sioh! Hit e5 lun7 iau2-boe7 khek in3-pan2, be7 tit thang chiau5-pian3 liu5-thoan5.
我因為開拆伊所講e5意思來hou7眾人看，向望這tiap8做父母e5人看著這篇，來反悔改換。
Goa2 in-ui7 khui-thiah i sou2 kong2 e5 i3-su3 lai5 hou7 cheng3 lang5 khoaN3, ng3-bang7 chit-tiap8 cho3 pe7-bo2 e5 lang5 khoaN3 tioh8 chit phiN, lai5 hoan2-hoe2 ke2-oaN7.
今論上帝teh生人，不論查甫查某，逐人hou7伊兩腳，本底beh hou7伊gau5行、快走。查甫--e5就是beh 因為國、因為家，行東去西。查某--e5是beh hou7伊服事序大，教訓子兒，ti7內面相幫贊來拖磨，因為beh盡伊振動做工e5本分，的確著用腳手。

TaN lun7 Siong7-te3 teh siN lang5, put-lun7 cha-pou cha-bou2, tak8 lang5 hou7 i nng7 kha, pun2-te2 beh hou7 i gau5 kiaN5, khoai3 chau2. Cha-pou--e5 chiu7-si7 beh in-ui7 kok, in-ui7 ke, kiaN5 tang khi3 sai. Cha-bou2--e5 si7 beh hou7 i hok8-sai7 si7-toa7, kau3-hun3 kiaN2-ji5, ti7 lai7-bin7 saN pang-chan7 lai5 thoa-boa5, in-ui7 beh chin7 i tin2-tang7 cho3 kang e5 pun2-hun7, tek-khak tioh8 eng7 kha chhiu2.
現今出在查某囡仔縛腳，直直是將大路用e5身體歸ti7無路用e5所在，辜負天e5恩情，背逆天e5真理，違逆天e5命令，罪惡攏總生出親像這是一項m7 thang縛--e5。

Hian7-kim chhut-chai7 cha-bou2 gin2-na2 pak8-kha, tit8-tit8 si7 chiong toa7 lou7-eng7 e5 sin-the2 kui ti7 bo5 lou7-eng7 e5 sou2-chai7, kou-hu7 thiN e5 in-cheng5, poe7-gek8 thiN e5 chin-li2, ui5-keh8 thiN e5 beng7-leng7. Choe7-ok long2-chong2 siN chhut chhin-chhiuN7 che si7 chit8 hang7 m7 thang pak8--e5.
Koh有孝是百行e5根源，朝廷用孝教示天下，聖賢用孝來感化世間。若是敗壞身體，hou7筋骨受損傷，有這號肢體，be7 做這號路用，何況歸身攏是父母所留e5體。

Koh iu2-hau3 si7 pek-heng7 e5 kin-goan5, tiau5-teng5 eng7 hau3 ka3-si7 thiN-e7, seng3-hian5 eng7 hau3 lai5 kam2-hoa3 se3-kan. Na7 si7 pai7-hoai7 sin-the2, hou7 kin-kut siu7 sun2-siong, u7 chit ho7 ki-the2, be7 cho3 chit ho7 lou7-eng7, ho5-hong3 kui-sin long2 si7 pe7-bo2 sou2 lau5 e5 the2.
有一te3仔傷害，的確驚了醫治be7 好，致到欠缺有孝e5道理。至於到腳就刁持來妝做，甘願損壞。這是不孝。父母替查某子縛腳，就是引 chhoa7 查某子做不孝。

U7 chit8-te3-a2 siong-hai7, tek-khak kiaN-liau2 i-ti7 be7 ho2, ti3-kau3 khiam3-khoeh iu2-hau3 e5 to7-li2. Chi3-u kau3 kha chiu7 tiau5-ti5 lai5 chng cho3, kam-goan7 sun2-hoai7. Che si7 put-hau3. Pe7-bo2 the3 cha-bou2-kiaN2 pak8-kha, chiu7-si7 in2-chhoa7 cha-bou2-kiaN2 cho3 put-hau3.
孝e5道理既然欠缺，其餘e5德行有甚物 thang講leh？這是兩項m7-thang縛--e5。
Hau3 e5 to7-li2 ki3-jian5 khiam3-khoeh, ki5-u5 e5 tek-heng7 u7 sim2-mih8 thang kong2 leh? Che si7 nng7 hang7 m7-thang pak8--e5.
聖人講，「身體、頭毛、肌膚攏是對父母承受--e5，m7-thang毀壞損傷」。這是講，著保惜、照顧，父母e5遺體。至於保惜家己所生e5體，就是仁慈e5心。人雖然極殘忍，無m7疼伊e5子，來保惜伊，抱伊，摸--伊，逐時關心。這是天性e5自然。

Seng3-jin5 kong2, “Sin-the2, thau5-mng5, ki-hu long2 si7 tui3 pe7-bo2 seng5-siu7--e5, m7-thang hui2-hoai7 sun2-siong”. Che si7 kong2, tioh8 po2-sioh, chiau3-kou3, pe7-bo2 e5 ui5-the2. Chi3-u po2-sioh ka-ti7 sou2 siN e5 the2, chiu7-si7 jin5-chu5 e5 sim. Lang5 sui-jian5 kek8 chan5-jim2, bo5 m7 thiaN3 i e5 kiaN2, lai5 po2-sioh i, pho7 i, bong--i, tak8 si5 koan-sim. Che si7 thian-seng3 e5 chu7-jian5.
設使有人傷害咱e5子一手，抑是一腳，是誰仔恬恬無話，甘願hou7人陷害mah？An2怎獨獨縛腳hit個因端就甘願家己傷害；又koh驚了傷害無夠額，致到hou7查某子痛疼艱苦be7 會堪tit，啼啼哮哮勻仔縛。做父母e5人m7但無憐憫e5心，反轉kiah8 chhoe5仔ka7扑。

Siat-su2 u7 lang5 siong-hai7 lan2 e5 kiaN2 chit8 chhiu2, a2 si7 chit8 kha, chi7-chui7-a2 tiam7-tiam7 bo5 oe7, kam-goan7 hou7 lang5 ham7-hai7 mah? An2-choaN2 tok8-tok8 pak8-kha hit e5 in-toaN chiu7 kam-goan7 ka-ti7 siong-hai7; iu7-koh kiaN-liau2 siong-hai7 bo5 kau3-giah8, ti3-kau3 hou7 cha-bou2-kiaN2 thang3-thiaN3 kan-khou2 be7 e7 kham-tit, thi5-thi5 hau2-hau2 un5-a2 pak8. Cho3 pe7-bo2 e5 lang5 m7-na7 bo5 lin5-bin2 e5 sim, hoan2-tng2 kiah8 chhoe5-a2 ka7 phah.
俗語講，「虎雖然毒，亦無食子」。親像 hit 號e5人，伊e5惡毒、殘忍親像甚物 leh？做父著有慈心，竟然到hiah殘忍，就是無慈心lah。這就是第3項m7 thang縛--e5。

Siok8-gu2 kong2, “Hou2 sui-jian5 tok8, iah8 bo5 chiah8 kiaN2”. Chhin-chhiuN7 hit-ho7 e5 lang5, i e5 ok-tok8, chan5-jim2 chhin-chhiuN7 sim2-mih8 leh? Cho3 pe7 tioh8 u7 chu5-sim, keng3-jian5 kau3 hiah chan5-jim2, chiu7-si7 bo5 chu5-sim lah. Che chiu7-si7 te7 saN hang7 m7 thang pak8--e5.
孔子講，「Sui2 e5面貌是惹出姦淫」。古早人講an2-ni，不過是講抹粉、點胭脂、hoa-hiat穿綾羅na7-tiaN7，iau2-ku2 m7免有惹出姦淫e5責備。況兼腳步行踏，若無端正，實在是惹姦淫e5款式，不止thang見笑。我驚了風俗對an2-ni衰微，人心對an2-ni敗壞。可見縛腳e5傷風敗俗。這是第4項m7 thang縛--e5。

Khong2-chu2 kong2, “Sui2 e5 bin7-mau7 si7 jia2 chhut kan-im5”. Kou2-cha2 lang5 kong2 an2-ni, put-ko3 si7 kong2 boah hun2, tiam2 ian-chi, hoa-hiat chheng7 lin5-lo5 na7-tiaN7, iau2-ku2 m7 bian2 u7 jia2 chhut kan-im5 e5 chek-pi7. Hong3-kiam kha-pou7 kiaN5-tah8, na7 bo5 toan-chiaN3, sit8-chai7 si7 jia2 kan-im5 e5 khoan2-sit, put-chi2 thang kian3-siau3. Goa2 kiaN-liau2 hong-siok8 tui3 an2-ni soe-bi5, jin5-sim tui3 an2-ni pai7-hoai7. Kho2-kian3 pak8-kha e5 siong-hong pai7-siok8. Che si7 te7 si3 hang7 m7 thang pak8--e5.

又koh料理煮食，是查某人e5本分，以及採桑種麻，亦著勤緊幫贊丈夫，況兼散hiong好額無平平。若是散hiong--e5做丈夫出腳落手，去種作終年拖磨，做某--e5就坐teh看親像縛死，一點氣力to be7相幫贊。Tu2著無啥事已經be7 堪tit艱苦。設使tu2著緊急事，m7-na7 be7 chhoa7 查甫，抱查某，出在伊所愛去koh驚了累著丈夫，罕tit會家己顧。雖然富貴e5家m7免替in拖磨，就是有thang飼奴僕女婢來扶來牽，行踏亦是無快活。這是失落幫助，就是第5項m7 thang縛--e5。

Iu7-koh liau7-li2 chu2-chiah8, si7 cha-bou2-lang5 e5 pun2-hun7, i2-kip8 chhai2-sng cheng3 moa5, iah8 tioh8 khin5-kin2 pang-chan7 tiong7-hu; hong3-kiam song3-hiong ho2-giah8 bo5 piN5-piN5. Na7 si7 song3-hiong--e5 cho3 tiong7-hu chhut-kha loh8-chhiu2, khi3 cheng3-choh chiong ni5 thoa-boa5, cho3 bou2--e5 chiu7 che7 teh khoaN3 chhin-chhiuN7 pak8 si2, chit8 tiam2 khui3-lat8 to be7 saN pang-chan7. Tu2 tioh8 bo5 siaN2-su7 i2-keng be7 kham-tit kan-khou2. Siat-su2 tu2 tioh8 kin2-kip su7, m7-na7 be7 chhoa7 cha-pou, pho7 cha-bou2, chhut-chai7 i sou2 ai3 khi3 koh kiaN-liau2 lui7 tioh8 tiong7-hu, han2-tit e7 ka-ti7 kou3. Sui-jian5 hu3-kui3 e5 ke m7 bian2 the3 in thoa-boa5, chiu7-si7 u7 thang chhi7 lou5-pok8 lu2-pi7 lai5 hu5 lai5 khan, kiaN5-tah8 iah8 si7 bo5 khoaN3-oah8. Che si7 sit-loh8 pang-chou7, chiu7-si7 te7 gou7 hang7 m7 thang pak8--e5.

天e5道理是世間e5光，是土地e5鹽。本然向望所講thang做發度，所行thang做模樣；親像光thang照暗，親像鹽thang照顧朽爛。教會內e5人應該著脫離hiah e5歹e5風俗，cham2然絕斷伊，來hou7人看樣。設使挨推無決斷，親像蓮藕at斷，hiah e5絲iau2-ku2相連。人就beh chia3-toan辯駁--咱，講，咱教會e5人都亦明明有這號背理逆天e5氣習，致到藐視天e5道理hou7人顛倒，別人kap家己攏受著連累，做歹無反悔就是明知故犯。這是第6項m7 thang縛--e5。

ThiN e5 to7-li2 si7 se3-kan e5 kng, si7 thou2-te7 e5 iam5. Pun2-jian5 ng3-bang7 sou2 kong2 thang cho3 hoat-tou7, sou2 kiaN5 thang cho3 bou5-iuN7; chhin-chhiuN7 kng thang chio3 am3, chhin-chhiuN7 iam5 thang chiau3-kou3 hiu2-noa7. Kau3-hoe7-lai7 e5 lang5 eng-kai tioh8 thoat-li7 hiah e5 phaiN2 e5 hong-siok8, cham2-jian5 choat8-tng7 i, lai5 hou7 lang5 khoaN3-iuN7. Siat-su2 e-the bo5 koat-toan3, chhin-chhiuN7 lian5-ngau7 at-tng7, hiah e5 si iau2-ku2 saN-lian5. Lang5 chiu7 beh chia3-toan pian7-pok--lan2, kong2, lan2 kau3-hoe7 e5 lang5 to iah8 beng5-beng5 u7 chit ho7 poe7-li2 gek8-thiN e5 khi3-sip8, ti3-kau3 biau2-si7 thiN e5 to7-li2 hou7 lang5 tian-to3; pat8 lang5 kap ka-ti7 long2 siu7 tioh8 lian5-lui7, cho3 phaiN2 bo5 hoan2-hoe2 chiu7-si7 beng5-ti kou3-hoan7. Che si7 te7 lak8 hang7 m7 thang pak8--e5.
扑算地球幾若百國，獨獨中國有縛腳e5風俗，真正無合情理，人若看見、聽見，無m7 liam5-piN驚惶奇怪。雖然中國親像慣勢自然，無一點仔奇怪，已經m7是現時國王e5法度。

Phah-sng3 te7-kiu5 kui2-na7 pah kok, tok8-tok8 Tiong-kok u7 pak8-kha e5 hong-siok8, chin-chiaN3 bo5 hap8 cheng5-li2, lang5 na7 khoaN3-kiN3, thiaN-kiN3, bo5 m7 liam5-piN kiaN-hiaN5 ki5-koai3. Sui-jian5 Tiong-kok chhin-chhiuN7 koan3-si3 chu7-jian5, bo5 chit8 tiam2-a2 ki5-koai3, i2-keng m7 si7 hian7-si5 kok-ong5 e5 hoat-tou7.
我bat看Tiong-hoa-liok8一部冊是康熙e5年間，鑑定e5，從中記載各朝平定e5起頭，tauh8-tauh8有beh 禁縛腳e5代誌。總是禁無成，an2-ni看出傷害身體，已經m7是各朝愛百姓e5治理；koh辜負上帝創造人e5本真。又koh教示百姓e5人著將改換風俗，做in e5本分，都也無聽見一人起來苦勸人。因為an2-ni Bu2-lu2-su2所以姑不chiong著講。

Goa2 bat khoaN3 Tiong-hoa-liok8 chit8 pho7 chheh si7 Khong-hi e5 ni5-kan, kam3 tiaN7 e5, chiong5-tiong ki3-chai3 kok-tiau5 peng5-tiaN7 e5 khi2-thau5, tauh8-tauh8 u7 beh kim3 pak8-kha e5 tai7-chi3. Chong2-si7 kim3 bo5 seng5, an2-ni khoaN3 chhut siong-hai7 sin-the2, i2-keng m7 si7 kok-tiau5 ai3 peh-siN3 e5 ti7-li2; koh kou-hu7 Siong7-te3 chhong3-cho7 lang5 e5 pun2-chin. Iu7-koh ka3-si7 peh-siN3 e5 lang5 tioh8 chiong ke2-oaN7 hong-siok8, cho3 in e5 pun2-hun7, to iah8 bo5 thiaN-kiN3 chit8 lang5 khi2 lai5 khou2-khng3 lang5. In-ui7 an2-ni Bu2-lu2-su2 sou2-i2 kou-put-chiong tioh8 kong2.
我ka7 伊翻譯解說，刊版流傳，hou7做父母e5人攏知縛腳e5歹氣習，無利益，掛有損害。逐人會存順天有孝慈悲e5心，出力除去引chhoa7 姦淫，kap失落幫贊，刁持犯著hiah e5毛病；反碾轉改換舊e5款式。可見一人若做起頭，幾若百人攏toe3 伊。若是an2-ni生才無辜負天生眾人e5路用，亦無辜負Bu2-lu2-su2做這篇論e5苦心。我實在teh大大望lah。

Goa2 ka7 i hoan-ek8 ke2-soeh, khan-pan2 liu5-thoan5, hou7 cho3 pe7-bo2 e5 lang5 long2 chai pak8-kha e5 phaiN2 khi3-sip8, bo5 li7-ek, koa3 u7 sun2-hai7. Tak8 lang5 e7 chun5 sun7 thiN iu2-hau3 chu5-pi e5 sim, chhut-lat8 tu5-khi3 in2-chhoa7 kan-im5, kap sit-loh8 pang-chan7, tiau5-ti5 hoan7 tioh8 hiah e5 mau5-peng7; hoan2-lin3-tng2 ke2-oaN7 ku7 e5 khoan2-sit. Kho2-kian3 chit8 lang5 na7 cho3 khi2-thau5, kui2-na7 pah lang5 long2 toe3 i. Na7 si7 an2-ni-siN chiah bo5 kou-hu7 thiN siN cheng3 lang5 e5 lou7-eng7, iah8 bo5 kou-hu7 Bu2-lu2-su2 cho3 chit phiN lun7 e5 khou2 sim. Goa2 sit8-chai7 teh toa7-toa7 bang7 lah.
頂面所寫 hit 層事較合ti7婦人人e5路用，所以請教會e5姊妹要緊來讀。可惜！Ti7教會內猶有這號毛病，就是有縛腳e5囡仔。

Teng2-bin7 sou2 sia2 hit chan5 su7 khah hap8 ti7 hu7-jin5-lang5 e5 lou7-eng7, sou2-i2 chhiaN2 kau3-hoe7 e5 chi2-moe7 iau3-kin2 lai5 thak8. Kho2-sioh! Ti7 kau3-hoe7-lai7 iau2 u7 chit ho7 mau5-peng7, chiu7-si7 u7 pak8-kha e5 gin2-na2.
今向望對看 hit 篇論了後，lin2教會e5姊妹koh較決斷e5心，無beh趁這個風俗。若是an2-ni就快快會除去這個弊病。

TaN ng3-bang7 tui3 khoaN3 hit phiN lun7 liau2-au7, lin2 kau3-hoe7 e5 chi2-moe7 koh khah koat-toan3 e5 sim, bo5 beh than3 chit e5 hong-siok8. Na7 si7 an2-ni chiu7 khoai3-khoai3 e7 tu5-khi3 chit e5 pe7-peng7.
近來ti7府城以及ti7草地有聽見姊妹kap囡仔幾若人歡喜留腳。今向望那久那濟愛學這號好模樣，變換舊底e5歹風俗。

Kin7-lai5 ti7 Hu2-siaN5 i2-kip8 ti7 chhau2-te7 u7 thiaN-kiN3 chi2-moe7 kap gin2-na2 kui2-na7 lang5 hoaN-hi2 liu5-kha. TaN ng3-bang7 na2 ku2 na2 che7 ai3 oh8 chit ho7 ho2 bou5-iuN7, pian3 oaN7 ku7-te2 e5 phaiN2 hong-siok8.
